useCase.name: Restrict Access to Files by IP Address

mainSequence.step: UI requests restriction options from Backend Server
Backend Server retrieves current access settings from Database
Database returns access settings to Backend Server
Backend Server displays current settings and IP restriction option to UI
Archivist applies IP restrictions by entering IP range
UI sends update access settings request with IP details to Backend Server
Backend Server updates file access settings with IP restrictions in Database
Database confirms settings updated to Backend Server
Backend Server displays success message to UI
UI confirms IP restriction implementation to Archivist
